wikipedia_page.main: Peggy Simpson (4 July 1913 in Leeds, West Riding of Yorkshire – January 1994 in London) was a British actress. She appeared twice for director Alfred Hitchcock in The 39 Steps (1935) and Young and Innocent (1937).

response: |Darby and Joan||Syd Courtenay||Peggy Simpson, Ian Fleming||Drama||
* Peggy Simpson as mother of Angus

Darby and Joan is a 1937 British drama film directed by Syd Courtenay and starring Peggy Simpson, Ian Fleming, Tod Slaughter and Mickey Brantford.BFI.org The film is a quota quickie, made at Elstree Studios for release by MGM.Chibnall p.288
